DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Two Silicone Hydrogel Lenses Over One Month Period
DOC.criteria: Current soft contact lens wearer wear habitual lenses less 10 hour day , 5 day week Have need correction eye correctable least 20/40 distance vision eye wear trial lens Replace lenses weekly longer schedule Other protocol inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply Requires concurrent ocular medication Eye injury surgery within twelve week immediately prior enrollment Evidence systemic ocular abnormality , infection , disease likely affect successful wear contact lenses use accessory solution Current soft toric lens wearer Those dispose soft lens daily basis Current NIGHT & DAY® Biofinity® lens wearer Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
